translations: 丧失；被迫放弃；被剥夺（forfeit 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He has forfeited his right to be taken seriously.
sentences.translation: 他被取消了需要认真对待的权利。

sentences.sentence: In doing so, the county has forfeited all future property taxes on this land.
sentences.translation: 这样一来，该县就没收了今后对这块土地征收的所有财产税。

sentences.sentence: He forfeited his property by crime.
